full_text: @Issajakala @seif_tanzania @WMkapa @jmkikwete @RBX_TonyBlair @10DowningStreet @FCDOGovUK @real_GeorgeBush @laurawbush @CondoleezzaRice @AmbJohnBolton @StimsonCenter @CSIS @UNSC_Reports Waziri Mdogo wa Mambo ya Nje-Udhibiti wa Silaha na Masuala ya Usalama ya Kimataifa(Under Secretary of State for Arms Control and International Security Affairs) na Balozi wa Marekani kwenye Umoja wa mataifa.
